comments:
Description:
Fail to preview optim sample report
Build number:2.2.2.v20071011

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open optim.rptdesign under report Examples view->Extending BIRT.
2. Compile the plug-in and copy it to eclipse plug-in folder.
3. Restart eclipse and preview optim.rptdesign.

Expected result
Preview is ok.

Actual result:
Fail to preview.
Error log:

ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- Invalid Javascript expression: Total.OptimisticSum(row["CREDITLIMIT"],1)
Invalid Javascript expression: Total.OptimisticSum(row["CREDITLIMIT"],1)
Invalid total function name: OptimisticSum
